# currentWorkoutActivity

**Instance Property**

The current workout activity.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var currentWorkoutActivity: HKWorkoutActivity? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains a workout activity that’s currently in progress, an activity with an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKWorkoutActivity/endDate] property set to `nil`. If you end the activity — for example, by calling [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKWorkoutSession/endCurrentActivity(on:)] or [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKWorkoutBuilder/updateActivity(uuid:end:completion:)] — the system sets this property to `nil` until you begin a new activity.

## Monitoring and controlling the workout

- **delegate**: The live builder’s delegate.
- **HKLiveWorkoutBuilderDelegate**: A protocol for monitoring live workout builders.
- **shouldCollectWorkoutEvents**: A Boolean value that determines whether the workout builder automatically adds events generated by the workout session.
